text: Untamed Fury is a 1947 American film. It was also known as The Outlander. ==Production== It was financed by the Danches brothers, industrialists who had made a fortune during the war and wanted to get into movie making. The budget was $165,000. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1947 films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American action films Category:1940s action films
title: Untamed Fury
